#include <algorithm>
#include <iostream>
#include <string.h>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <math.h>

using namespace std;
const double eps=1e-8;
int main()
{
	int n;cin>>n;
	string s;cin>>s;
	double a,f;cin>>a>>f;
	double now=0;
	for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
	{
		if(s[i]=='L') 
		{
			now+=a;
		}else now-=a;
		
		if(fabs(now)+eps>f) 
		{
			puts("NO");
			return 0;
		}
	}
	puts("YES");
	return 0;
}
